Class StdDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.games.cardgames.StdDeck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deck

    public class StdDeck
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deck
    Title: StdDeck.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: A standard card deck with and without Jokers

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 17, 2016

    updates:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdDeck()
      default constructor builds a Standard Deck with 0 Jokers
      StdDeck(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
      convenience constructor allows us to pass an options map and build Deck using options from the map
